meanings.definition: A group of people with a common interest or purpose.
meanings.sent1: At the park, the broo gathered for a picnic.
meanings.sent2: The book club is a broo that meets every Tuesday.
meanings.sent3: The broo of gamers had a marathon gaming session.
meanings.sent4: The broo of stars in the sky twinkled brightly.
meanings.sent5: The broo of students worked together on a science project.

meanings.definition: A slang term for a friend or buddy.
meanings.sent1: Hey broo, want to grab some pizza after school?
meanings.sent2: My broo always has my back when I need help.
meanings.sent3: The broo I met at the concert was super friendly.
meanings.sent4: My loyal broo is like a brother to me.
meanings.sent5: I consider my best friend to be my closest broo.
